#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

struct compare  
{  
  bool operator()(const int& l, const int& r)  
  {  
      return l > r;  
  }  
}; 

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	priority_queue<int> max;
	priority_queue<int ,vector<int>,compare>min;
	int count=1,size=0;
	while(n--)
	{
		int a;
		scanf("%d",&a);
		if(a==1)
		{
			int x;
			scanf("%d",&x);
			size++;
			if(count%3==0)
			{
				if(max.top()>x)
				{
					min.push(max.top());
					max.pop();
					max.push(x);
					count++;
				}
				else
				{
					min.push(x);
					count++;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if(min.empty()!=1)
				{
					if(x>min.top())
					{
						max.push(min.top());
						min.pop();
						min.push(x);
						count++;
					}
					else
					{
						max.push(x);
						count++;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					max.push(x);
					count++;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if(size<3)
				printf("No reviews yet\n");
			else
				printf("%d\n",min.top());
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
